Lords and ladies! The tea and sweets are already served and here is the list of the latest news from our kingdom:
- The free daily chest. The Academy of sorcerers has over-indulged in the potion of generosity and a new daily chest was created. We have decided to keep this gift in the game.
- The social newsfeed. Find out on-line what medieval people think and keep an eye on the 'likes'.
- There are now more monsters in the game. Still, there is no need be afraid - it's better to pull yourself together and to resist the evil creatures.
- Choose the notifications. If you do not want to receive notifications while you are away from the castle, disable them in the game’s settings menu.
- The premium account. Get more with a premium account that is created for the most active and dedicated players.
- The goblin. My lord! Your subjects have found a goblin but he does not want to work for free. For a nominal fee, he will become an indispensable worker while you are not in the castle.
- D'ya like dags? They are already here, and they are ready to settle in your castle and to cheer you up with their loud barking!
- Find out more news and details in the news section of the game.

- Fight free friendly battles within your clan
- Apples are down 30%
- Share your PvP battle replays
- Greater chance of getting items from Invasion chests
- Meet the new pet, a cute kitty
- Open the next chest without having to go back to the Warehouse
- Use diamonds to increase dwellers' potentials
- Animated 3D global map and PvE zones
- Fixed bugs and improved game performance
- See game news to learn more about this update

Dear Lords! What is that sound? Can you hear it too? It's the sound of trumpets announcing the start of the Tournaments! More on this and lots more below:
* Arena Tournaments! Fight the Kingdom's bravest warriors in the Arena. By participating in tournaments, you will get Badges of Courage that can be used in the Tournament Store to buy armor and weapons with unique properties. Also, the Store offers a new type of combat items, Artifacts.
* Artifacts! A new type of combat items that characters can equip. They have unique properties and will help you implement the most cunning plans to defeat an opponent.
* Trophies! Defeated Grav? Or Frogus? Or maybe you defeated opponents 100 times in a row? It is time you bragged about these and other adventures of yours.
* Player Profile! You no longer need a piece of paper to jot down the number of victories, your preferred squad, etc. to avoid forgetting all those things! All statistics are available right in your profile.
Fixed bugs and improved game performance

- Hustle Castle is launching a grand event very soon! Take part in the Great Holiday Challenge to earn loads of unique rewards.
- The Level 11 Throne Room can now admit more dwellers
- The Gem Bay has been made easier to complete
- Rewards of the chests have been improved
- Final story zone available now

- Hustle Castle will see a new UNIQUE event very soon! Expect a Great Royal Challenge with a multitude of rewards, both old and new.
- The Hero appearance interfaces have been slightly improved.
- We keep improving the Arena matchmaking system.
- Enemy power has been adjusted in Invasions.
- Critical bug fixes

- A new summer event is coming soon! Wait for Shrum to show up at your castle gate. The new area, the Fuss, collection cards, and unique rewards are waiting for you!
- New unique rewards, including weapon runes that you are already familiar with and brand-new armor runes!

- Breaking news: princess has been kidnapped! Again! What happened this time? New zones, cunning bosses and incredible plot twists are waiting for you in Hustle Castle.

- There will be a new event with unique rewards and skins on April 1st. Grav himself will come to the castle gate in his new appearance.

- Dear Lords and Ladies, Grav is coming to your castles and he brings a new event with unique rewards and valuable prizes with him!
- We’ve been observing your accomplishments in the Dungeon closely. Today’s update contains useful features and improvements for Dungeons and Heroes.

- Very soon, the game will see a new event. Wait for Grav to show up at your castle gate! New gear with unique abilities, tons of useful rewards, and a barrel of fun guaranteed.
- The Warlord is a new rank available within the clan. Also, you can now rename ranks.
- We’ve introduced heavy penalties for bot usage.
- New gear with unique abilities is available in the Arena Store.
- Read more about the new features in the game.

- Expanded statistics at the end of a battle
- Ability to show items in the in-game chat
- New Tournament trophies
- Bug fixes and UI improvements
